mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.dept_id AS deptId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.user_name AS userName, u.id_card AS idCard, u.user_type AS userType, u.email, u.avatar, u.phonenumber AS phoneNumber, u.`password`, u.sex, u.salt, u.`status`, u.del_flag AS delFlag, u.login_ip AS loginIp, u.login_date AS loginDate, u.create_by AS createBy, u.create_time AS createTime, u.remark FROM t_user u WHERE u.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user( dept_id, login_name, user_name, email, phonenumber, sex, `status`, id_card, user_type, del_flag, create_by, create_time, remark ) values
